justification: Proposal ignores B’s conservative, floor-first preferences. It asks B to give a Tier 1 RB (Alex Thompson) and an injured RB for a dual-threat QB B doesn’t value, a volatile rookie WR, and a low-tier rookie TE—positions B already covers (Holt at QB, Alex Thomas at TE). B prioritizes volume and veterans, and is comfortable buying injured players, not selling them. Rationale only addresses A’s needs and is generic.
